it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.blockwise

Interface BlockwiseTransactionServerListener


  • public interface BlockwiseTransactionServerListener
    Listens for server-side blockwise transfer events.

      void onTransactionFailure(CoapTransactionServer ts)
